long_description: The light and breathable boys' Marmot Drifter Shirt delivers built-in sun protection and odor control making it ideal for long days of summertime fun. Blend of polyester and cotton with Dri-Release(R) wicks away moisture and dries quickly, perfect for hiking through the woods or playing at the park. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Fresh Guard(R) finish offers long-lasting odor control. The Marmot Drifter Shirt features a tag-free neckline and flatlock seams.
